docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
GET /api/ptables/1007981702-ptable77
200
{
  "layout": "zerombr yes\\nclearpart --all    --initlabel\\npart /boot --fstype ext3 --size=<%= 10 * 10 %> --asprimary\\npart /     --f   stype ext3 --size=1024 --grow\\npart swap  --recommended",
  "os_family": "Redhat",
  "created_at": "2015-12-01T02:41:06Z",
  "updated_at": "2015-12-01T02:41:06Z",
  "name": "ptable77",
  "id": 1007981702,

}
